name: Mom and babycare
shortDescription: We are committed to serve mother and newborn baby with full dedication. We have an environment which will ensure mother and baby as if they are in their own home.
LongDescription: We are committed to serve mother and newborn baby with full dedication. We have an environment which will ensure mother and baby as if they are in their own home. Our health stuffs are really kind and sincere about their job. You will find the best services available in the city. Our Specialist doctors and nurses will take great care for you and your child.

name: Cardiology

name: Cancer Treatment
shortDescription: We have the expertise and technologies to diagnose , test and treat many types of cancer patients. We provide Radiotherapy, Cameotherapy and other terapies for our cancer patients.
